Text.p: The fighting event is now over and the Raid Boss charts have been updated.
Over the last month, I have been pretty hammered at work. Additionally, I have been working on code that will make updates (especially new Raid Bosses) be much faster and less effort.
That being said, there are a lot of changes I have included with the latest release, including:

ol.li: New Raid Boss charts for the latest round of Raid Bosses.
Updated Shopping Boxes for the Fighting-Type Pokémon Event.
A new look in the Pokemon Stats pages.

Ability to see different "forms".
(For Example: Normal, Rainy, Snowy and Sunny forms of Castform)

And a whole lot more!
(And I am working a bunch of stuff you'll see soon!)

Text.p:
I'm not completely done yet, but I wanted to get the latest to you as soon as possible, so please be patient if you find issues, but let me know.
I would LOVE to get your feedback!
Let me know about typos, broken links, hard-to-understand (or badly worded) information, etc.
Also, let me know if there is something you would like for me to add or enhance.
Just send me an e-mail at pokeeref@gmail.com (The extra 'e' is not a typo. pokeref@gmail.com was already taken. 😁)
